Name: GLAD VALAKAS TOWER DEFENCE
About the game: 2027. Due to the global economic crisis, Valera’s grandfather’s garage is attacked by many enemies who are trying to capture the hero’s golden bucket. Help Valera to repel the attacks of enemies and defend the most valuable thing for him. Key features: 4 chapters with unique enemies Small shop with in-game currency Comic Book Style Graphic Great soundtrack Steam Achievements Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Bleak Fufel.
